/usr/bin/c++   -g -lSDL    CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/game_class.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/image_handler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/player.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/world.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/creature_base.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/zombie.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ZMART.dir/projectiles.cpp.o  -o ZMART -rdynamic
